Instance.description: An aspiration used to track active whim sets for a Sim.

Tunable.name: activated_priority
Tunable.description: Priority for this set to be chosen if triggered by contextual events.

Tunable.name: chained_priority
Tunable.description: Priority for this set to be chosen if triggered by a previous whim set.

TunableList.name: connected_whim_sets
TunableList.description: A tunable list of whim sets that upon a goal from this list succeeding will activate

Tunable.description: These Aspiration Whim Sets become active automatically upon completion of a whim from this set.

TunableList.name: connected_whims
TunableList.description: A tunable list of whims that upon a goal from this list succeeding will activate.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The goal to map.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A tunable list of whim sets that upon this whim goal completing will activate

Tunable.description: These Aspiration Whim Sets become active automatically upon completion of this whim.

Tunable.name: cooldown_timer
Tunable.description: Number of Sim minutes this set of Whims is de-prioritized after de-activation.

TunableVariant.name: force_target
TunableVariant.description: Upon WhimSet activation, use this option to seek out and set a specific target for this set. If the desired target does not exist or is not instanced on the lot, WhimSet will not activate.

TunableTuple.name: genealogy_target
TunableTuple.description: This option tests for completion of a tuned Achievement.

TunableTuple.name: relationship_target
TunableTuple.description: This option tests for completion of a tuned Achievement.

TunableTuple.name: relationship_test
TunableTuple.description: The relationship state that this goal will complete when obtained.

Tunable.name: invert_num_relations
Tunable.description: If checked then we will check that your Num Relations is less than or equal to the value rather than the other way around.

TunableList.name: match_all
TunableList.description: All of these relationship bits must match to fail the test.

TunableList.name: match_any
TunableList.description: If any of these relationship bits match the test will fail.

TunableTuple.name: relationship_score_interval
TunableTuple.description: The range that the relationship score must be within in order for this test to pass.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: match_all
TunableList.description: All of these relationship bits must be present to pass the test.

TunableList.name: match_any
TunableList.description: Any of these relationship bits will pass the test.

TunableEnum.name: test_event
TunableEnum.description: The event that we want to trigger this instance of the tuned test on.

TunableVariant.name: test_incest
TunableVariant.description: Test for incest status. Test passes if this matches the two Sim's incest status.

Tunable.name: track
Tunable.description: If set, the test will use the relationship score between sims for this track. If unset, the track defaults to the global module tunable REL_INSPECTOR_TRACK.

TunableList.name: objectives
TunableList.description: A Set of objectives for completing an aspiration.

Tunable.description: One objective for an aspiration

Tunable.name: priority_decay_rate
Tunable.description: The decay rate of a whimset's priority. A whimset's priority will only decay when a whim of that whimset is active. A whimset's priority will converge to the whimset's base priority.

TunableVariant.name: secondary_target
TunableVariant.description: Upon WhimSet activation, define a Sim that is used as a flavor target, such that text can reference it. For example, a Dare whim might use this field such that a "Flirt with Bobby" whim has a "(From Being Dared by Frank)" origin.

TunableTuple.name: genealogy_target
TunableTuple.description: This option tests for completion of a tuned Achievement.

TunableTuple.name: relationship_target
TunableTuple.description: This option tests for completion of a tuned Achievement.

TunableTuple.name: relationship_test
TunableTuple.description: The relationship state that this goal will complete when obtained.

Tunable.name: invert_num_relations
Tunable.description: If checked then we will check that your Num Relations is less than or equal to the value rather than the other way around.

TunableList.name: match_all
TunableList.description: All of these relationship bits must match to fail the test.

TunableList.name: match_any
TunableList.description: If any of these relationship bits match the test will fail.

TunableTuple.name: relationship_score_interval
TunableTuple.description: The range that the relationship score must be within in order for this test to pass.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: match_all
TunableList.description: All of these relationship bits must be present to pass the test.

TunableList.name: match_any
TunableList.description: Any of these relationship bits will pass the test.

TunableEnum.name: test_event
TunableEnum.description: The event that we want to trigger this instance of the tuned test on.

TunableVariant.name: test_incest
TunableVariant.description: Test for incest status. Test passes if this matches the two Sim's incest status.

Tunable.name: track
Tunable.description: If set, the test will use the relationship score between sims for this track. If unset, the track defaults to the global module tunable REL_INSPECTOR_TRACK.

Tunable.name: timeout_retest
Tunable.description: Tuning an objective here will re-test the WhimSet for contextual relevance upon active timer timeout; If the objective test passes, the active timer will be refreshed. Note you can only use tests without data passed in, other types will result in an assert on load.

Tunable.name: whim_reason
Tunable.description:
The reason that shows in the whim tooltip for the reason that this whim was chosen for the sim.
0 (Number): The most relevant numerical value pertaining to the completion of this goal. This is usually the number of iterations required to complete it although it could also be other values such as the price of the item that the user is required to purchase.
1 (Sim): The Sim who owns the goal.
2 (Sim): The Sim the goal is directed at.
3 (Sim): The goal's secondary SimInfo, if one exists.

Tunable.name: goal
Tunable.description: A goal in the set.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: Higher number means higher chance of being selected.
